Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Sheffield, South Yorkshire, England, UK 1st prize £12 and cup, 2nd prize £8 and 3rd prize £6 divided between Grimesthorpe ans Sheffield Temperance, 4th prize £4, 5th prize £1 14 bands competed.
